text: Nirban, also spelt Narban or Nirwan, is a large gotra of Hindus of Haryana. There are villages of Nirban in Pataudi. They an also be found in the Badli and Haidurpur villages of Delhi. Nirban is also a clan of Rajputs. According to Sir Henry Miers Elliot, the Nirban gotra is also found in the Ahirs. ==Related pages== *Majhraut (Ahir) == References == Category:Yadav
title: Nirban
